data.name: applyDiscount/infoText
data.value: Select a Tier %(level)s vehicle to purchase it with a %(discount)s discount

data.name: boxPopover/toShop/smallBox/description
data.value: Purchase boxes for your Garage or for friends %(link)s

data.name: breakScreen/enoughToyFragment/title
data.value: You have enough shards to create a decoration

data.name: breakScreen/noToys/asia/label
data.value: There are no decorations in your inventory. Complete missions and earn decorations to beautify your Garage.

data.name: breakScreen/noToys/label
data.value: You have no decorations in your inventory. Complete missions or purchase boxes with gifts in the Premium Shop.

data.name: breakScreen/noToysInFilter/label
data.value: Nothing found. Change your filter settings or reset them to default.

data.name: breakScreen/tooltip/filter/body
data.value: Filter settings allow you to find suitable decorations that meet the selected parameters.

data.name: collections/tooltip/awards/nations/header
data.value: Relevant for Vehicles of the Following Nations:

data.name: collections/tooltip/bonusInfo/bottom/description
data.value: Bonus is added to experience, credits and crew experience earned in a battle. With a Level X Atmosphere, the base bonus will be multiplied by %(value)s.

data.name: collections/tooltip/bonusInfo/bottom/line1
data.value: • Collect more decorations: %(count)s needed to increase the bonus to %(bonus)s%%

data.name: collections/tooltip/bonusInfo/descr
data.value: Bonus is applied to battle results and will be active for the duration of the New Year event.

data.name: collections/tooltip/bonusInfo/header/asian
data.value: Bonus for Chinese New Year Collection

data.name: collections/tooltip/bonusInfo/header/soviet

data.name: collections/tooltip/decoration/notObtained

data.name: collections/tooltip/decorations/info/bonus/text
data.value: All decorations received and broken during the event are counted.

data.name: collections/tooltip/decorations/info/howto/text
data.value: Use the Large Holidron Decorider to create decorations from shards or open boxes with gifts.

data.name: collections/tooltip/decorations/info/tips/text
data.value: • Broken decorations %(text)s. • You can increase or decrease the Atmosphere level by adding or removing decorations.

data.name: collections/tooltip/entry/body

data.name: system_messages/applyDiscount/tankmen/success

data.value: Failed to break the decoration: invalid parameters specified.

data.value: Failed to break the decoration: server error.

data.value: Discount activation error: the discount for this vehicle was not found.

data.name: system_messages/finished
data.value: You have some unused rewards. Do not forget to activate them by mid-March!

data.name: system_messages/invoiceReceived/allBoxesOpened
data.value: We opened the boxes for you and added the rewards for Holiday Ops

data.name: system_messages/open/error/NO_ITEMS
data.value: Error receiving present: no boxes or crates found.

data.name: system_messages/open/error/underOpening
data.value: Error receiving present: please wait until the previous operation is complete.

data.name: system_messages/placeToy/error/invalidRequest
data.value: Error adding decoration: invalid parameters specified.

data.name: system_messages/presentBox/body
data.value: You received a present from a friend: %(settingStartTag)s%(setting)s%(settingEndTag)s with valuable presents (x%(countStartTag)s%(count)d%(countEndTag)s).

data.name: system_messages/request/error/common
data.value: Action is temporarily unavailable. Try again later.

data.name: system_messages/request/error/cooldown
data.value: Error: the operation is temporarily suspended.

data.name: system_messages/request/error/requestIsBeingProcess
data.value: Action unavailable. Please wait until the previous request of the same type is completed.

data.name: system_messages/request/error/time out
data.value: Error: the time for executing the operation has expired.

data.name: system_messages/setting/collected/message/body
data.value: For completing the full %(setting)s collection you receive the following rewards: Styles: %(styles)s Inscriptions: %(titles)s Emblems: %(emblem)s

data.name: system_messages/setting/collected/titles/modernWestern
data.value: Happy New Year!, Gott nytt år!, Merry Christmas!

data.name: system_messages/setting/collected/titles/soviet
data.value: May the new year bring new victories!

data.name: system_messages/setting/collected/titles/traditionalWestern
data.value: Bonne Annee!, Stastny Novy Rok!, Szczęśliwego Nowego Roku, Frohe Weihnachten

data.name: system_messages/started/body
data.value: Decorate your Garage and earn valuable rewards.

data.name: system_messages/state/error/notAvailable
data.value: Holiday Ops have been temporarily disabled.

data.name: system_messages/state/finished
data.value: Holiday Ops have ended, thank you for your participation, we will see you next year!

data.name: system_messages/tankmanRecruit/error/NOT_FOUND
data.value: Failed to recruit the female crew member: the female crew member was not found.

data.name: system_messages/tankmanRecruit/error/NO_DISCOUNTS
data.value: Failed to recruit the female crew member: discounts not found.

data.name: system_messages/tankmanRecruit/error/server_error
data.value: Failed to activate the discount: server error.

data.name: system_messages/tankmanRecruit/success
data.value: The female crew member has been successfully recruited.

data.name: tooltip/box/buy/body
data.value: Purchase boxes with decorations from any collection for yourself and your friends on the Holiday Ops page.

data.name: tooltip/box/win/body
data.value: Awarded for the completion of holiday missions.

data.name: tooltip/carouselItem/disable/body
data.value: Holiday Ops have been disabled due to technical reasons. We will fix everything tomorrow morning. Meanwhile, have a rest and eat something tasty.

data.name: tooltip/carouselItem/noProgress/body
data.value: Click to decorate your Christmas tree and other elements. The higher the Festive Atmosphere level, the more valuable the rewards you receive.

data.name: tooltip/flakes/descr
data.value: Break the decorations you do not need and create new ones from shards.

data.name: tooltip/settings/toys/toy100/descr
data.value: The snowflake is extremely fragile. Try not to breathe on it or speak near it.

data.name: tooltip/settings/toys/toy101/descr
data.value: "Please do not express your political views when my parents come to celebrate with us." "Sure, darling."

data.name: tooltip/settings/toys/toy102/descr
data.value: When you look at this tree topper, you are keenly aware of the inexorable cyclical unfolding of the universal being in a strictly defined order.

data.name: tooltip/settings/toys/toy103/descr
data.value: "After the holidays, I do nothing till March, and then I'm the Easter Bunny."

data.name: tooltip/settings/toys/toy136/descr
data.value: Very fun to ride, as we all know.

data.name: tooltip/settings/toys/toy137/descr
data.value: One toy Rhm.-Borsig Waffenträger is boarding the nope train right now.

data.name: tooltip/settings/toys/toy138/descr
data.value: Illuminate your Garage and stop locating heavy objects with your little toe.

data.name: tooltip/settings/toys/toy139/descr
data.value: He has the luck of the Irish, the pride of the Germans, the calm of the English, the charm of the Spanish, and the only way this pup knows is up!

data.name: tooltip/settings/toys/toy140/descr
data.value: This will help you get mobile, agile, and hostile ...and hide the tears when your team loses.

data.name: tooltip/settings/toys/toy141/descr
data.value: I am a grown and successful adult who definitely needs this toy train set.

data.name: tooltip/settings/toys/toy142/descr
data.value: There may be a little present inside, but looking in the dog and opening it up could be a bit strong.

data.name: tooltip/settings/toys/toy143/descr
data.value: It is travel-sized for your convenience and does not do any tongue things.

data.name: tooltip/settings/toys/toy193/descr
data.value: "Dear Santa, I want a tank named Maus for beating up the teamkillers who destroy my vehicle. It could take its orders from the talking onigiri, so it wouldn't be my fault."

data.name: tooltip/settings/toys/toy195/descr
data.value: A perfect fit for birthdays, Christmas, and measuring the wavelength-weighted power emitted by a holiday light source.

data.name: tooltip/settings/toys/toy196/descr
data.value: The prototype used by a brave climatologist at Ecopoint: Antarctica.

data.name: tooltip/settings/toys/toy197/descr
data.value: "A gingerbread man sits inside a gingerbread house..."

data.name: tooltip/settings/toys/toy199/descr
data.value: Come on, shoot me in the gun mantlet, I deer you!

data.name: tooltip/settings/toys/toy200/descr
data.value: For best results, put it in front of a rainbow at three o'clock.

data.name: tooltip/settings/toys/toy201/descr
data.value: Switched to a tank from a four-door, chillin' on Himmelsdorf, your T is 34 (WoT ting).

data.name: tooltip/settings/toys/toy202/descr
data.value: One of the most prominent engineers in the world designed and created this night eco-drone, but we are not telling you WHO. Ba dum tss.

data.name: tooltip/settings/toys/toy203/descr
data.value: A fragile but radiantly beautiful decoration created by artful glassblowers. Ask your cat to leave it alone.

data.name: tooltip/settings/toys/toy204/descr
data.value: A fragile but radiantly beautiful decoration created by artful glassblowers. Ask your cat to leave it alone.

data.name: tooltip/settings/toys/toy205/descr
data.value: It is official: the Type 59 Gold is available to all players! Not for long though. Also not THE Type 59 Gold.

data.name: tooltip/settings/toys/toy206/descr
data.value: This sack can be exchanged for all the Premium vehicles in the game. NOT!

data.name: tooltip/settings/toys/toy207/descr
data.value: "Look, Simba. Everything the light touches is our kingdom."

data.name: tooltip/settings/toys/toy208/descr
data.value: The Witch and the Wardrobe are available for only $49.99.

data.name: tooltip/settings/toys/toy225/descr
data.value: I knew the old skis from my garage would eventually come in handy.

data.name: tooltip/settings/toys/toy226/descr
data.value: A loyal servant of Her Majesty. Or His Majesty. Depends on the time period.

data.name: tooltip/settings/toys/toy227/descr
data.value: You can pass all your messages to Santa via this snowman. However, there is a risk they will only be delivered when pigs fly!

data.name: tooltip/settings/toys/toy228/descr
data.value: "Yesterday is history, tomorrow is a mystery, but today is a gift. That is why it is called the present."

data.name: tooltip/settings/toys/toy245/descr
data.value: Whose idea was it to just stuff everything back in the box? Oh, it was mine? Nevermind.

data.name: tooltip/settings/toys/toy246/descr
data.value: When you handle this decoration, be patient. Just as patient as when you are reloading the Bat.-Châtillon 155 58 with an injured Loader and damaged ammo rack.

data.name: tooltip/settings/toys/toy247/descr
data.value: This is the perfect example of an ideal combination of diligence and nerves of steel.

data.name: tooltip/settings/toys/toy248/descr
data.value: Definitely achieve balance with the Force, one who mounts all these decorations will.

data.name: tooltip/settings/toys/toy265/descr
data.value: If you press your ear firmly against the door, you can hear someone transmitting answers to multiple New Year requests in Morse.

data.name: tooltip/settings/toys/toy266/descr
data.value: This is where I feel at home, with peace and quiet, far away from the hustle and bustle of the big city.

data.name: tooltip/settings/toys/toy267/descr
data.value: Santa Claus knows when you have been good or bad, but the developers know too.

data.name: tooltip/settings/toys/toy268/descr
data.value: Honor the dragon by decorating your house with some Asian details.

data.name: tooltip/settings/toys/toy285/descr
data.value: Despite their high price, these lamps boast long service, low power consumption and immunity to tough weather conditions. Strongly recommended for an electric atmosphere.

data.name: tooltip/settings/toys/toy286/descr
data.value: Licking it would definitely not be the best idea.

data.name: tooltip/settings/toys/toy287/descr
data.value: After you fall asleep in your rocking chair and forget to put it out, Mr. Oil Lamp is not your friend.

data.name: tooltip/settings/toys/toy288/descr
data.value: Each lantern is powered by a pretty candle. Saves electricity, saves the environment, saves having to find those batteries rolling around in the bottom of the drawer.

data.name: tooltip/settings/toys/toy289/descr
data.value: Well, it is not the rug, but it really ties the Christmas tree together.

data.name: tooltip/settings/toys/toy292/descr
data.value: He has the luck of the Irish, the pride of the Germans, the calm of the English, the charm of the Spanish, and the only way this pup knows is up!

data.name: tooltip/settings/toys/toy64/descr
data.value: Examined and approved by Gosudarstvennaya Atestatsionnaya Komissiya. The changing colors arouse an inexplicable urge to rush B, whatever that means.

data.name: tooltip/settings/toys/toy66/descr
data.value: Wait, where did my Christmas tree go?

data.name: tooltip/settings/toys/toy68/descr
data.value: Look how shiny this garland is! But why is my cat gazing so longingly at it?

data.name: tooltip/settings/toys/toy70/descr
data.value: A cheap but fancy decoration suitable for both wrapping a present and putting on a Christmas tree.

data.name: tooltip/settings/toys/toy72/descr
data.value: A cheap but fancy decoration suitable for both wrapping a present and putting on a Christmas tree.

data.name: tooltip/settings/toys/toy74/descr
data.value: You do not need a scar on your forehead to do magic. All you need is paper and scissors. Fold, cut, unfold, and ta da! Festoon managed.

data.name: tooltip/settings/toys/toy76/descr
data.value: The legend says that the Chinese dragon is very flexible because some ruthless map designers from a faraway game company used its backbone for a ridge.

data.name: tooltip/slotDelete/body
data.value: Click to free up the slot for another decoration.

data.name: tooltip/tankmen
data.value: Awarded for reaching Festive Atmosphere Levels IV, VI, VIII, and X.
